resources.string: Black plays first, and players alternate in placing a stone of their color on an empty intersection. The winner is the first player to get an unbroken row of five pieces horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.

After each game is finished, you will have the ability to share an image of the board with your contacts. In order to do so, permissions must be set for the app and at least one of the contacts on this device should have an email saved.
